title: Alpha Wives presenting scholarship to Roland Norad, surrounded by, from left: Gladys McCullough, Oteria Nicholson, Merlise Angel, Marguerite Walter, Betty Moncrief, hostess Nadine Primas standing behind sofa, Alyce Parr, Doris Strothers, Cecile Springer handing paper to Roland Nored, Elise Bennett, Madelyn Hairston, Loretta Green, Fannie Williams, Lee Bertha Nicklos, and Murrel Wynn Jones, posed in Primas home with portrait of woman, ruched curtains, and ceiling with exposed beams
medium: black and white: Kodak Safety Film
